text:
Samabandhi Bhojan was held in Sri Arunachaleswarar Temple in view of former Chief Minister C.N.Annadurai’s death anniversary on Wednesday.

District Collector A. Gnanasekaran, District Revenue Officer S. Palani, Superintendent of Police R. Ponni, Revenue Divisional Officer R. Umamaheswari and Deputy Superintendent of Police, Tiruvannamalai town Saravanakumar were among those took part in the feast. The DMK has organised a silent rally in memory of their founder leader from Gandhi Statue to Anna Statue. Former minister K.Pichandi and host of party functionaries including R.Sridharan, D.Venugopal, M.Sundaresan, P.Karthi Velmaran and C.N.Annadurai participated in the rally.
title: Anna death anniversary
